content.rendered:
Directed by Antoine Fuqua.

Written by Richard Wenk.

Cast Denzel Washington. Dakota Fanning. David Denman.

Language English.

Producer Tarak Ben Ammar. Todd Black. Jason Blumenthal. Tony Eldridge. Antoine Fuqua. Guja Quaranta. Alex Siskin. Enzo Sisti. Michael Sloan. Steve Tisch. Clayton Townsend. Denzel Washington.

Production Columbia Pictures. Escape Artists. Sony Pictures Entertainment (SPE).
